synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: dark green solution, filtered through a nylon membrane (0.22 μm)
dissolved in air, subsequent diffusion of diethyl ether vapor into the solution
synthesis_conditions.form: dark green needle-shaped crystals suitable for X-ray analysis

synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: supernatant was decanted and replaced with a fresh solution of Cp2Co in THF/MeCN mixture (20 mL, 1:1) for an additional 24 h

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with MeCN (3 × 10 mL) and then THF (3 × 10 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried for 24 h at 60 °C under reduced pressure

synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: supernatant was decanted and replaced with a fresh solution of [Cp2Fe](BF4) in THF/MeCN mixture (10 mL, 1:1) for an additional 24 h

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with MeCN (3 × 5 mL) and then THF (3 × 5 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried for 24 h at 60 °C under reduced pressure

FT-IR_spectra.description: FT-IR spectra highlighting certain modes of vibrations: νCH from (Cp2Co)+, νCO, and νSO.

XPS_survey_spectra.description: XPS survey spectra collected at 300 K.

Raman_spectra.description: Raman spectra collected at 300 K, following excitations at 785, 633, 532, and 405 nm. The Raman intensities are adjusted for better comparison between different excitation wavelengths. Note that both the νCO and νMO vibrations for 1red at 1459 and 573 cm−1, respectively, are enhanced with the excitation at 532 nm.
